item.title: Large quantity of household waste dump over stretch of read., 21st July
item.description:
Picture shows main tip but also smashed tv and varios other tips that have been there for nearly 3 weeks. All between along Canberra Road Charlton Park Lane and Meridian Centre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Canberra Road, Charlton, London

item.title: Constant street rubbish in SE108DZ, 21st July
item.description:
Thereâ€™s an incredible amount of constant rubbish on the street in front of Greenwich Academy in SE108DZ. Much worse than the neighbouring streets. To make things even worse, the rubbish ends up inside our property over time. We have never seen anyone cleaning the street in 3 years that we have lived here. How is this possible?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Blackheath Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gullies and drains are blocked, 21st July
item.description:
Previously reported and problem not solved on FixMyStreet ref: 7463088 When it rains the drain does not take the water and it floods to The Gatehouse's entrance. This problem is caused by the drains being clogged and the gullies not being cleaned out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large rug dumped near no.3, 21st July

item.title: Tree pruning, 21st July
item.description:
Resident called report tree which overgrown and needs cutting back. The tree is very bushy and in between the phone lines, and it's also causing a lot bird mess. Please can we inspect and advise caller.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Awliscombe Road, East Wickham, London

item.title: E bike bollards not removed from resident parking bay, 21st July
item.description:
